---
title: "Convert list("stats::density") to list("data.frame")"
rdname: "fortify.density"
date: "2015-04-25"
output: html_document
layout: article
category: "ggfortify"
images: ""
---




{% highlight r %}
fortify(stats::density(stats::rnorm(1:50)))
{% endhighlight %}
